description: Sometimes steeze is top of mind, but that shouldn't mean that's all there is to it?which is why this one has both style and purpose. No matter which colorway you choose, it's built with a technical fabric that does more than just up your coolness factor?whether it's providing protection from the sun or reducing its environmental impact before it gets to your closet.
name: Mountain Hardwear Greenstone SS Shirt - Mens
